participant_2.background:
I love the feeling of being free to speak my mind, even if it is not always appropriate.
I enjoy playing Magic: the Gathering in my free time.
I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures looking for new ways to learn.
My mornings consist of listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers while I get ready for the day.
i live with my parents and my little brother.

content.text: Hello! I like to play magic the gathering too! Whats your favorite deck?
I've been playing since I was a kid so I have quite a few decks. I'm a big fan of the commander format. What about you?
I'm a big fan of the commander format too! I like to play a lot of control decks, with blue being my favorite color.
I'm a big fan of red and green, so I usually play aggro or midrange decks.
My favorite animal is a zebra. What's yours?
I'm a big fan of butterflies. They're just so beautiful and delicate.
I love butterflies too! I even have a tattoo of a butterfly on my back.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to get a tattoo, but I'm not sure what I want yet.
I think you should get a butterfly tattoo! They're so beautiful and they're a reminder of the beauty of nature.
That's a great idea! I think I'll do that. Thanks for the suggestion!
